text: Montserrat Carulla i Ventura (September 19, 1930 – November 24, 2020) was a Spanish actress. She was born in Barcelona. Her career began in the 1940s through stage productions. Her best known movie roles were in Furrows (1951), Companys, procés a Catalunya (1979) and in The Orphanage (2007). Carulla died in Barcelona on November 24, 2020 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Actors from Barcelona
title: Montserrat Carulla
